EmailTemplate.subject: This Month in Spring... SpringOne Tour is coming to NYC and London!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
June 2018 Hi, Spring fans, and welcome to another action-packed installment of This Month in Spring. And what a month it's been! Your humble host has been around the globe and back in search of the perfect post and the perfect audience for that post. It seems like—on every day and in every way—the posts only get better and better. These are the best kinds of problems!
In between post perusing and content collecting, I have continued my journeys to the ever-awesome, ever-enthusiastic, ever-amenable, ever-appreciative, and ever-inspiring audiences of Springdom.
A lot has happened since we last talked. I visited Manchester, UK, for an appearance at the Manchester JUG <[[https://www.meetup.com/ManchesterUK-Java-Community/events/248184150/]]>, before heading to London for customer visits and the epic Devoxx UK event <[[https://www.devoxx.co.uk/]]>. Then it was off to Denver, CO, for the SpringOne Tour event <[[https://springonetour.io/2018/denver?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-june-2018]]>. I've also been to beautiful Kiev, Ukraine, to present at the epic JEEConf <[[https://jeeconf.com/]]>; Dublin, Ireland, and Belfast, Northern Ireland, to meet with a few amazing Pivotal customers (like Liberty <[[https://twitter.com/Liberty_IT/status/998847225735327744]]>); and bella Barcelona, Spain, for the Spring I/O conference <[[https://2018.springio.net/]]>.
After a restive 48 hours in San Francisco, I travelled to sunny St. Louis, MO, for the epic Spring One Tour St. Louis event <[[https://springonetour.io/2018/st-louis?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-june-2018]]>, before setting course to Singapore for Voxxed Singapore <[[https://voxxeddays.com/singapore/]]>. Next, I'll be in New York for the Spring One Tour NYC event <[[http://springonetour.io/2018/nyc?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-june-2018]]>; the Netherlands for customer visits; London for the SpringOne Tour London event <[[http://springonetour.io/2018/london?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-june-2018]]>; Paris, France, for the JHipster 5 Conference <[[https://jhipster-conf.github.io/]]>; Krakow, Poland, for Devoxx PL <[[http://devoxx.pl/]]>; São Paulo, Brazil, for Spring Connect <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/Spring-Connect-Brazil-2018-BR.html?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-june-2018]]>; Egypt for more customer visits; and then it'll be July.
If you're in any of these regions (or anywhere, really): reach out! <[[https://twitter.com/starbuxman]]> I'd love to hear from or see you!
The Long and short of it <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/this-month-in-spring-may-29th-2018?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-june-2018]]>
SpringOne Tour Takes Flight
The SpringOne Tour is gaining busloads of momentum as it barrels into New York City <[[http://springonetour.io/2018/nyc?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-june-2018]]> on June 11–12, after which it will magically convert into a sea- or airfaring machine and jump across the pond to London <[[http://springonetour.io/2018/london?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-june-2018]]>, June 21–22. We’d love for you to join us so check out our tour page <[[https://springonetour.io/?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-june-2018]]> to sign up and see the other cities (and transformative powers!) are up next.
June 11–12, 2018 New York City, NY <[[http://springonetour.io/2018/nyc?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-june-2018]]>
June 21–22, 2018 London, UK <[[http://springonetour.io/2018/london?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-june-2018]]>
Follow the magic bus <[[https://2018.event.springonetour.io/register/registration/select?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-june-2018]]>
Register for S1P
Can you believe that SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-june-2018]]> is only a summer away? Keep an eye on the S1P website <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-june-2018]]> for new session and keynote updates. There is still time to get discounted conference pricing and reduced training prices if you register before July 31st, 11:59pm PDT. Register now <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-june-2018]]>—while you still can!—and save $200. If you didn’t know, now you know!
Sign me up! <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=spring-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=spring-newsletter-june-2018]]>
